ygData.subject: Re: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure about either one of these spells as I haven t used them with my SK yet, however I did use Shadow Step with my Necro once and really liked the
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure about either one of these spells as I haven't used them with my
SK yet, however I did use Shadow Step with my Necro once and really liked
the spell, however, IT too became completely useless once I realized that
even though you teleport to a different spot your target still has you
targeted. This is a really lame part of the Shadow Step spell. The spell
actually began to work against me since more often than not I would be the
one to get disoriented and my target would somehow miraculously know exactly
where I was going to appear. And may the "gods" help me if I was fighting a
caster when I used Shadow Step. They simply just kept blasting as if I
decided "No wait Mr. Caster, kill over here in this spot instead." Complete
and total waste of mana since the you remain targeted by your opponent. So
to answer your question if this spell is still the same as it was when I was
using my Necro than it wouldn't hurt my feelings to see it go. Voice Graft
I haven't ever once used with neither my Necro OR my SK.

Drizzen,
Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook <bhook@...>
To: shadowknight@onelist.com <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, September 17, 1999 2:00 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Another suggestion


>From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>
>
>Okay, here's a question for you folks. What if Shadow Step and Voice Graft
were replaced with some kind of lifetap spells? Would
>this be grossly unbalancing or hurt the class?
>
>If we tune the SK we can't really ADD new spells, since this would give
them more spells than the other hybrids at each rank.
>
>Brian
>
